document.full_text: oklahoma governor mary fallin on wednesday signed into law a measure prohibiting abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, making it the fourth state to ban such late term abortions.
document.title: oklahoma is fourth state to ban abortions after 20 weeks
lines_and_colors: oklahoma governor mary fallin on wednesday signed into law a measure prohibiting abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, making it the fourth state to ban such late term abortions.
